item.description:
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿Beyond the Abyss with Energy and Intuition

with Becca Chambers 

The exciting new technology of whole body vibration sends vibration through every cell and molecule in your body, which has profound effects on every aspect of your system. Benefits proven by research include increasing bone density, metabolism, circulation, muscle strength and balance, sex and rejuvenation hormone levels, and increased levels of serotonin (the neurotransmitter associated with calmness, happiness and good sleep). Additionally, as vibration is medium of energy there are profound energy balancing and strengthening effects. We will explore and experience whole body vibration during this presentation, along with a discussion of how high-dose homeopathy works in conjunction with WBV as a powerful method for releasing negative energy and thus improving one’s life on every level: physical, emotional, psychological and spiritual.

Becca Chambers is a naturopath (Clayton College of Natural Health) who has spent the last 25 years discovering new powerful and safe natural health methods to heal first herself and then many others.  Her new book is Beyond the Great Abyss: Enlightenment, Redemption and my Journey into the Unknown.

 

Potluck lunch and community building from 11:30 - 12:15 pm.  Presentation from 12:15 - 1:15 pm. 

$10 meetup fee.

Please let us know what you are bringing to the potluck when you RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll welcome you at the door
item.name: October Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
